---
title: "View documentation activity"
date: last-modified
---

Use the audit trail functionality in the {{< var vm_platform >}} to track or audit all the information events associated with a specific model.

## Prerequisites

This topic matters for model developers, model validators, and auditors.

- The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory^1^
- Model documentation has already been created for this project^2^
- A model developer has started generating documentation, either using the {{< var vm_dev >}}^3^ or via the online UI editor

::: {.column-margin}
**Learn more:**

^1^ [Register models in the inventory](../model-inventory/register-models-in-model-inventory.qmd)

^2^ [Working with model documentation](working-with-model-documentation.qmd)

^3^ [{{< var vm_framework >}}](../../developer-framework/get-started-developer-framework.qmd)
:::

## Steps

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

2. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.

{{< include _view-documentation-activity-steps.qmd >}}
